content: As an AI language model, I can tell you that it is difficult to predict the extent to which electric aircraft will replace traditional aircraft. While electric planes offer several advantages, such as reduced emissions and lower operating costs, traditional aircraft still offer benefits in terms of range and speed. Additionally, the existing aerospace and aviation infrastructure is designed around traditional aircraft, and significant investment would be required to move towards electric planes. It is possible that both traditional and electric planes will continue to coexist, with electric aircraft potentially being used for short-haul flights and traditional aircraft for longer distances. Regardless, it is clear that the aviation industry will continue to strive towards reducing emissions and increasing sustainability through the development of new technologies and infrastructure.
